customer_message: I can't log into my account. It keeps saying 'Invalid credentials' even though I'm sure my password is correct. I've tried resetting it twice but still can't access my dashboard. This is urgent as I need to submit a report by end of day.

The application completely freezes when I try to upload documents larger than 10MB. I've tested this on multiple browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari) and it happens every time. The upload bar gets to about 60% then the whole browser tab becomes unresponsive.

I was charged twice this month for my Pro subscription. My credit card statement shows two charges of $29.99 on the same day (March 15th). I only have one account and didn't upgrade anything. Can you please refund the duplicate charge?

Could you please add a bulk export feature? Right now I have to download each report individually which takes forever when I need to export 50+ reports for compliance purposes. A 'select all' checkbox and bulk download would save me hours of work every month.

How do I change my notification preferences? I'm getting way too many email alerts and it's cluttering my inbox. I'd like to keep the important ones but turn off the daily digest emails. I looked in Settings but couldn't find the right section.

I can't access my account at all - when I try to log in it just shows a blank white page. I've cleared my browser cache, tried incognito mode, and even tried from my phone but same issue. This started happening right after I changed my password yesterday evening.

The search function is extremely slow and often returns irrelevant results. When I search for 'quarterly reports' it takes 10+ seconds to load and shows me random documents that don't contain those keywords. This used to work fine but has gotten progressively worse.

My subscription was automatically renewed but I cancelled it last month. I have the cancellation confirmation email dated February 18th. Please cancel this charge and confirm my subscription is properly terminated. The charge amount is $49.99.

Would it be possible to add a reminder system for upcoming deadlines? Right now I have to manually track everything in my calendar. An email reminder 24 hours before a deadline would be incredibly useful for keeping projects on track.

I accidentally deleted an important document and need to recover it. It was called 'Q4_Financial_Report.pdf' and I deleted it around 2 PM today. Do you have any way to restore deleted files? This contains critical data for tomorrow's board meeting.

Two-factor authentication stopped working on my phone. I'm not receiving the SMS codes anymore even though my phone number hasn't changed. I can't log in without the 2FA code. Can you temporarily disable 2FA so I can access my account and reconfigure it?

The dashboard takes an extremely long time to load - sometimes up to 30 seconds. This only started happening last week. Other pages load normally but the main dashboard is painfully slow. I'm on a fast internet connection so it's not my network.

I need to update my payment method but the credit card section in billing shows an error. When I click 'Update Card' it says 'Payment processor unavailable'. I need to update this before my next billing cycle tomorrow.

Please add the ability to customize keyboard shortcuts. As a power user, I'd love to create my own shortcuts for frequently used actions like creating new projects, saving, and switching between views. This would significantly speed up my workflow.

How do I set up automated backups for my projects? I want to ensure my data is automatically backed up weekly but I can't find this option anywhere in the settings. Is this feature available on my current plan?

My password reset isn't working. I click the reset link in the email but it takes me to a page that says 'Invalid or expired token'. I've tried requesting multiple reset emails over the past 2 hours but they all have the same issue.

Files are corrupting during upload. I've uploaded the same Excel file 5 times and each time it shows as 0 bytes and won't open. The original file is 2.4MB and works fine on my computer. This is happening with multiple file types, not just Excel.

I was charged for the Enterprise plan but I only signed up for Professional. I have screenshots of the checkout page showing $29/month Professional plan, but my credit card was charged $99 for Enterprise. Please correct this billing error immediately.

Could you add a batch processing feature for document conversion? I regularly need to convert 20-30 Word documents to PDF and doing them one by one is very time consuming. A queue system where I could select multiple files would be perfect.

What's the difference between the Professional and Enterprise plans? I'm considering upgrading but the feature comparison chart on your website doesn't load properly. Can you send me a detailed breakdown of what additional features I'd get with Enterprise?
